text: Briley may refer to: ==People== * Alex Briley, member of Village People * Beverly Briley, American politician * Briley Brothers, American spree killers * David Briley (born 1964), American politician * Jonathan Briley, the 9/11 "Falling Man" * Martin Briley, English musician * John Briley, American writer, best known for "Gandhi" (1982) * Rob Briley (born 1966), American politician * Briley Casanova, American gymnast ==Places== * Briley Township, Michigan
title: Briley
